metadata.description:
This interlude between Mage: The Hero Discovered and Mage 2: The Hero Defined. 

First Interlude: This gorgeously rendered account of Matchstick clearly coming into his own was originally published in the back of Grendel.

Second Interlude: This interlude sets the stage for Mage 2: The Hero Defined.
metadata.name: Mage Vol. 2: The Hero Defined
